questions: Can you describe your experience working with SQL server databases, including versions 2014 and 2016?
What are some of the key SQL features you have utilized, such as Joins, Set Operators, and Sub Queries?
How do you approach writing and optimizing SQL queries, as well as developing Stored Procedures and User-defined functions?
Can you explain your experience with Triggers, Views, Cursors, and Synonyms in SQL development?
What is your experience with SSRS in generating reports from SQL server databases, including features like Drill-Down and Cascading Reports?
How have you handled importing/exporting data between different sources in your projects?
What transformations have you implemented in SSIS packages, such as Data Conversion, Derived Columns, and Union All?
Can you discuss your experience with deploying reports and creating subscriptions in SSRS?
How have you used NANO BI Analytical tool in your projects, particularly in creating tables and deploying reports?
How do you approach writing complex SQL queries, creating different types of reports, and scheduling stored procedures in your projects?
